text: I am KH CEO and co-founder of mestica
mestica was founded in 2019 in the
launch of Malaya an open- Source natural
language tool kit library for the Malay
language since then we've evolved to
building multimodal AI solutions for
Southeast Asia starting with Malaysia's
first large language model called malam
malam supports Malay local English
Mandarin and Tamil across chatbots
translation services and speech
recognition our unique focus is on
developing multilingual and localized AI
Solutions with data governance
compliance and privacy as key priorities
I am husin the CTO and co-founder of
misstica as a cloud native platform we
needed to address the compute intensive
requirements to serve our large language
models and meet the expected demand from
our Enterprise and public sector
customers
to date we have trained on
197 data sets totaling close to 200
billion tokens of Malaysia specific
content from publicly available sources
we connected with the a startup team to
explore ways to optimize our inference
workloads this was especially important
for ensuring scalability and flexibility
in our deployments guidance from the AWS
startup team we were able to access
valuable credits from the AWS activate
program this allowed us to migrate our
remaining model training workloads to
AWS and deploy inference workloads for
our incoming Enterprise pilots and
customers using AWS ec2 G5
instances we also experimented with AWS
influencia and trinium to explore
further
scalability this was particularly
helpful for our new product development
with these models we saw cost savings up
to 87% by using Ed S tranium and 58% by
using EDS
influencia additionally our recent ec2
redeployment to the AWS region in
Malaysia resulted in a 20% reduction in
latency so this is critical for
achieving humanik conversation response
speeds in our voice assistant
product we are are continuously
innovating with the neuron framework
developing custom libraries to expand
its
capabilities from a business perspective
our collaboration with AWS has been
highly impactful by leveraging AWS
established presence expensive customer
Network and the launch of the AWS region
in Malaysia we've gained valuable goto
Market opportunities to take our cting
ede solutions to Enterprises across the
country this position us at the
Forefront of Malaysia's rapidly growing
cloud computing landscape empowering us
to rapidly scale our offerings and
deliver transformative AI capabilities
to customers
